overview:
Jennifer Yanoff leads the worldwide sales and marketing organization at Innoveer. Her responsibilities include directing Innoveer’s overall sales and marketing strategy, developing all programs and communications, overseeing Innoveer’s alliances and managing the global team.

With a focus on account and customer management, Jennifer sets the company’s sales and marketing direction to ensure that the firm exceeds its customers’ needs. To that end, she ensures that Innoveer, after 12+ years of industry tenure, remains leading edge, with best-in-class sales strategies, service offerings and partnerships.

Prior to joining Innoveer in 2004, Jennifer was the director of marketing at Steelpoint Technologies, Inc., a leading provider of legal and compliance solutions. Her responsibilities included managing all communications and lead-generation programs, as well as key partnerships and user conferences. During her tenure, Steelpoint’s revenue increased by 55 percent. Prior to Steelpoint, Jennifer worked at Miller Consulting Group with a focus on the high-technology industry. Jennifer holds a Bachelors Degree from Bates College.
